<p>
			<h1>Git: Create a Github Token</h1>
			<p>
				To create a github token, log into the github account you want the token for and 
				select settings from the gear menu in the upper right hand corner of the page as shown below.  
				When an option is given, select the clasic option if it is available. 
				<br/>
				<img width="800px" src="./img/developer-how-tos/git-quickstart/token/select-settings.png" />
				<br/><br/>
				Select "Developer settings" from the menu on the left.  
				<br/>
				<img width="800px" src="./img/developer-how-tos/git-quickstart/token/developer-settings.png" />
				<br/><br/>
				Select "Personal access tokens", "Tokens (clasic)", then "Generate new token".  
				<br/>
				<img width="800px" src="./img/developer-how-tos/git-quickstart/token/generate-token.png" />
				<br/><br/>
				Copy the token and save it in a text file someplace safe.
			</p>

</p>
